displayName.japanese: 新たな希望が目覚めた

description.english: Start Dandara's journey through the Salt.
description.french: Commencez le voyage de Dandara à travers le sel.
description.german: Beginne Dandaras Reise durch das Salz.
description.italian: Inizia il viaggio di Dandara attraverso il Salt.
description.japanese: ダンダラの冒険をはじめた
description.russian: Начать путешествие Дандары по Соли.
description.schinese: 穿过萨特，开始丹达拉之旅。
description.tchinese: 透過索爾特開始彈多拉的旅程。
description.spanish: Comienza el viaje de Dandara a través de la Sal.
description.portuguese: Começa a aventura da Dandara através do Sal.
description.brazilian: Comece a jornada de Dandara através de Sal.

description.english: Finish the game
description.french: Finir le jeu
description.german: Schließe das Spiel ab.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco
description.japanese: ゲームをクリアした
description.russian: Пройти игру
description.schinese: 完成游戏
description.tchinese: 完成遊戲
description.spanish: Termina el juego
description.portuguese: Termina o jogo
description.brazilian: Vença o jogo.

description.english: Save the Village and retrieve the Stone of Creation.
description.french: Sauvez le village et récupérez la Pierre de la Création.
description.german: Rette das Dorf und birg den Stein der Schöpfung.
description.italian: Salva il Villaggio e recupera la Pietra della Creazione.
description.japanese: 村を守り、創造の石を手に入れた
description.russian: Спасти деревню и найти Камень творения.
description.schinese: 拯救村庄，并找回创造之石。
description.tchinese: 拯救村落並獲取創造之石。
description.spanish: Salva a la aldea y recupera la Piedra de la Creación
description.portuguese: Salva a Aldeia e recupera a Pedra da Criação.
description.brazilian: Salve a Aldeia e recupere a Pedra da Criação.

description.english: Venture through the Desert to find the Rock of Remembrance.
description.french: Aventurez-vous dans le désert pour trouver le Rocher du Souvenir.
description.german: Reise durch die Wüste, um den Stein der Erinnerung zu finden.
description.italian: Avventurati nel Deserto per trovare la Roccia del Ricordo.
description.japanese: 砂漠を探検して追憶の岩を手に入れた
description.koreana: 기억의 바위를 찾으러 사막으로 모험을 떠나십시오.
description.russian: Пройти через пустыню в поисках Камня памяти.
description.schinese: 冒险穿越沙漠寻找纪念之石。
description.tchinese: 冒險穿越沙漠尋找追憶之石。
description.spanish: Aventúrate en el desierto para encontrar la Roca del Recuerdo.
description.portuguese: Aventura-te através do Descobreerto para achar a Pedra da Recordação
description.brazilian: Aventure-se pelo Deserto e encontre a Rocha das Lembranças.

description.english: Go around the Fortress and Receive the Stone of Intention.
description.french: Faites le tour de la Forteresse et recevez la Pierre de l’Intention.
description.german: Umgehe die Festung und erhalte den Stein der Absicht.
description.italian: Aggira la Fortezza e Ottieni la Pietra dell’Intento.
description.japanese: 砦を探検して意志の岩石を手に入れた
description.russian: Обойти крепость и получить Камень намерений.
description.schinese: 绕过要塞，获得意向之石。
description.tchinese: 在堡壘游走並獲取動機之石。
description.spanish: Rodea la fortaleza y recibe la Piedra de la Intención.
description.portuguese: Dá a volta à Fortaleza e recebe a Pedra da Intenção
description.brazilian: Dê a volta na Fortaleza e consiga a Pedra da Intenção.

description.english: Grab the Pearl Of Dreams.
description.french: Prenez la perle des Rêves.
description.german: Schnappe dir die Perle der Träume.
description.italian: Afferra la Perla dei Sogni.
description.japanese: 夢のしずくを手に入れた
description.russian: Найти Жемчужину сновидений.
description.schinese: 夺取梦想之珠。
description.tchinese: 抓住夢之珠。
description.spanish: Consigue la Perla de los Sueños
description.portuguese: Pega na Pérola dos Sonhos.
description.brazilian: Pegue a Pérola dos Sonhos.

displayName.japanese: 叩きつぶすしかないわね

description.english: Beat Augustus and free the besieged village.
description.french: Battez Augustus et libérez le village assiégé.
description.german: Besiege Augustus und befreie das belagerte Dorf.
description.italian: Batti Augustus e libera il villaggio assediato.
description.japanese: アウグストゥスを倒し、村を守った
description.russian: Победить Августа и освободить захваченную деревню.
description.schinese: 击败奥古斯都斯，解救被围困的村庄。
description.tchinese: 擊敗奧古斯都並解放被包圍的村莊。
description.spanish: Derrota a Augustus y libera la aldea asediada.
description.portuguese: Derrota o Augustus e liberta a aldeia cercada.
description.brazilian: Derrote Augustus e recupere a vila dominada.

displayName.french: À visage dévoilé et cœur caché

description.english: Beat Belia and soften the old stone heart.
description.french: Battez Bélia et adoucissez le vieux cœur de pierre.
description.german: Besiege Belia und erweiche das alte Steinherz.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Belia e intenerisci il vecchio cuore di pietra.
description.japanese: ベリアを倒し、石の心臓を砕いた
description.koreana: 벨리아를 물리치고 오래되고 비정한 마음을 부드럽게 만드십시오.
description.russian: Победить Белию и смягчить старое окаменевшее сердце.
description.schinese: 击败贝利亚，软化古老的石心。
description.tchinese: 擊敗貝利亞並感化其鐵石心腸。
description.spanish: Derrota a Belia y reblandece el antiguo corazón de piedra.
description.portuguese: Derrota a Bélia e amolece o coração de pedra velho.
description.brazilian: Derrote Bélia e abrande o velho coração de pedra.

description.english: Beat Eldar and free the Salt from his oppression.
description.french: Battez Eldar et libérez le Sel de son oppression.
description.german: Besiege Eldar und befreie das Salz aus seiner Unterdrückung.
description.italian: Batti Eldar e libera il Salt dalla sua oppressione.
description.japanese: エルダーを倒し、ソルトの圧制を終わらせた
description.koreana: 엘다를 무찌르고 솔트를 그의 억압에서 해방시키십시오.
description.russian: Победить Элдара и освободить Соль от его тирании.
description.schinese: 击败艾尔达，并将萨特从他的迫害中拯救出来。
description.tchinese: 擊敗元老並釋放被壓制的索爾特。
description.spanish: Derrota a Eldar y libera a la Sal de su opresión.
description.portuguese: Derrota Eldar e liberta o Sal da opressão dele.
description.brazilian: Derrote Eldar e libere o Sal dessa opressão.

description.english: Find all chests in the game.
description.french: Trouvez tous les coffres du jeu.
description.german: Finde alle Truhen im Spiel.
description.italian: Trova tutti i forzieri nel gioco.
description.japanese: すべての宝箱を見つけた
description.russian: Найти все сундуки в игре.
description.schinese: 找到游戏中的所有宝箱。
description.tchinese: 找到游戲內所有寶箱。
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los cofres en el juego
description.portuguese: Descobre todos os baús do jogo.
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os baús do jogo.

description.english: Visit every corner of the Salt.
description.french: Visitez tous les recoins du Sel.
description.german: Besuche alle Ecken des Salzes.
description.italian: Visita ogni angolo del Salt.
description.japanese: ソルトの隅々まで旅した
description.russian: Побывать в каждом уголке Соли.
description.schinese: 参观萨特的每个角落。
description.tchinese: 到訪索爾特的每個角落。
description.spanish: Visita cada rincón de la Sal.
description.portuguese: Visita todos os cantos do Sal.
description.brazilian: Visite todos os cantos do Sal.

description.english: Finish the game after visiting every room and finding every chest!
description.french: Terminez le jeu après avoir visité toutes les pièces et trouvé tous les coffres !
description.german: Beende das Spiel, nachdem du alle Räume besucht und alle Truhen gefunden hast!
description.italian: Completa il gioco dopo aver visitato ogni stanza e aver trovato ogni forziere!
description.japanese: すべての部屋と宝箱を見つけた上でゲームをクリアした
description.koreana: 모든 방과 모든 상자를 찾은 후 게임을 완료하십시오!
description.russian: Пройти игру, посетив каждую локацию и открыв все сундуки!
description.schinese: 完成游戏时参观了所有房间并找到了所有宝箱！
description.tchinese: 到訪每個房間並找出每個寶箱後通關！
description.spanish: ¡Termina el juego tras visitar cada habitación y encontrar cada cofre!
description.portuguese: Termina o jogo após visitar todas as salas e descobrir todos os baús!
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo após visitar todos os cantos e encontrar todos os baús!

description.english: Finish the game after finding more than 85% of the chests.
description.german: Beende das Spiel, nachdem du mehr als 85 % der Truhen gefunden hast.
description.french: Terminer le jeu après avoir trouvé plus de 85 % des coffres.
description.italian: Completa il gioco dopo aver trovato più del 85% dei forzieri.
description.koreana: 85% 이상의 상자를 찾은 후 게임을 완료하십시오.
description.spanish: Termina el juego tras encontrar más del 85 % de los cofres.
description.schinese: 完成游戏时找到了超过 85% 的宝箱。
description.tchinese: 找到超過超過 85% 的寶箱後通關。
description.russian: Пройти игру, открыв более 85 % сундуков.
description.japanese: すべての宝箱のうち、85%よりも多くを見つけた上でゲームをクリアした
description.portuguese: Termina o jogo depois de achar mais de 85% dos baús.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo após encontrar mais de 85% dos baús.

description.english: Finish the game without opening more than 35% of the chests.
description.german: Beende das Spiel, ohne mehr als 35 % der Truhen zu öffnen.
description.french: Terminer le jeu après avoir trouvé plus de 35 % des coffres.
description.italian: Completa il gioco senza aprire più del 35% dei forzieri.
description.koreana: 35% 이상의 상자를 열지 않고 게임을 완료하십시오.
description.spanish: Termina el juego sin haber abierto más del 35 % de los cofres
description.schinese: 完成游戏时打开了不超过 35% 的宝箱。
description.tchinese: 打開少於 35% 寶箱的情況下通關。
description.russian: Пройти игру, открыв не более 35 % сундуков.
description.japanese: すべての宝箱のうち、35%以下しか開けずにゲームをクリアした
description.portuguese: Termina o jogo sem abrir nem 35% dos baús.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo sem abrir mais de 35% dos baús.

description.english: Finish the game with less than 75% of the rooms visited.
description.french: Terminer le jeu avec moins de 75 % de salles visitées.
description.german: Beende das Spiel, ohne mehr als 75 % der Räume zu besuchen.
description.italian: Completa il gioco visitando meno del 75% delle stanze.
description.japanese: すべての部屋の75%未満しか訪れずにゲームをクリアした
description.russian: Пройти игру, посетив менее 75 % локаций.
description.schinese: 完成游戏时只参观了低于 75% 的房间。
description.tchinese: 以少於 75% 完成游戲。
description.spanish: Termina el juego con menos del 75 % de las habitaciones visitadas.
description.portuguese: Termina o jogo sem visitar nem 75% das salas.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo sem visitar 75% das salas.

description.english: Be faster than us, and finish the game in less than "1h, 17m".
description.french: Soyez plus rapide que nous et finissez le jeu en moins de 1h 17 min.
description.german: Sei schneller als wir und beende das Spiel in weniger als 1h 17m.
description.italian: Sii più veloce di noi, e completa il gioco in meno di 1h 17 min.
description.japanese: 開発者たちのベストタイム1時間17分未満でゲームをクリアした
description.russian: Быть быстрее нас и пройти игру менее чем за 1h 17m.
description.schinese: 比我们更快，并以少于1小时17分的时间完成游戏。
description.tchinese: 搶先我們一步，並在1小時17分以內完成遊戲。
description.spanish: Sé más rápido que nosotros y termina el juego en menos de 1h 17m.
description.portuguese: Sê mais rápido que nós e termina o jogo em menos tempo que 1h 17m.
description.brazilian: Seja mais rápido do que nós e termine o jogo em menos de 1h17m.

displayName.japanese: タイムアタックの初心者

description.english: Finish the game in less than "2h".
description.french: Terminer le jeu en moins de 2h.
description.german: Beende das Spiel in weniger als 2h.
description.italian: Completa il gioco in meno di 1h 17 min.
description.japanese: 2時間未満でゲームをクリアした
description.russian: Пройти игру менее чем за 2h.
description.schinese: 以少于2小时的时间完成游戏。
description.tchinese: 在2小時以內完成遊戲。
description.spanish: Termina el juego en menos de 2h.
description.portuguese: Termina o jogo em menos que 2h.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo em menos de 2h.

description.english: Carry more than 8000 Pleas of Salt at once
description.french: Portez plus de 8000 requêtes du Sel à la fois.
description.german: Trage mehr als 8000 Flehen des Salzes gleichzeitig.
description.italian: Trasporta più di 8000 Suppliche del Salt alla volta
description.japanese: 一度にソルトの粒を8000より多く所有した
description.russian: Нести более 8000 единиц мольбы Соли за раз.
description.schinese: 一次性携带超过 8000 个萨特的请求
description.tchinese: 同時攜帶超過8000的索爾特懇求
description.spanish: Lleva más de 8000 Súplicas de la Sal a la vez
description.portuguese: Carrega mais de 8000 Apelos de Sal duma vez
description.brazilian: Tenha mais de 8000 Apelos de Sal de uma vez.

displayName.french: Dans les bonnes grâces du Sel

description.english: Carry more than 13000 Pleas of Salt at once
description.french: Portez plus de 13000 requêtes du Sel à la fois.
description.german: Trage mehr als 13000 Flehen des Salzes gleichzeitig.
description.italian: Porta più di 13000 Suppliche del Salt alla volta
description.japanese: 一度にソルトの粒を13000より多く所有した
description.russian: Нести более 13000 единиц мольбы Соли за раз.
description.schinese: 一次性携带超过 13000 个萨特的请求
description.tchinese: 同時攜帶超過13000的索爾特懇求
description.spanish: Lleva más de 13000 Súplicas de la Sal a la vez
description.portuguese: Carrega mais de 13000 Apelos de Sal duma vez
description.brazilian: Tenha mais de 13000 Apelos de Sal de uma vez.

description.english: Carry more than 20000 Pleas of Salt at once
description.french: Portez plus de 20000 requêtes du Sel à la fois.
description.german: Trage mehr als 20000 Flehen des Salzes gleichzeitig.
description.italian: Trasporta più di 20000 Suppliche del Salt in una volta
description.japanese: 一度にソルトの粒を20000より多く所有した
description.russian: Нести более 20000 единиц мольбы Соли за раз.
description.schinese: 一次性携带超过 20000 个萨特的请求
description.tchinese: 同時攜帶超過20000的索爾特懇求
description.spanish: Lleva más de 20000 Súplicas de la Sal a la vez
description.portuguese: Carrega mais de 20000 Apelos de Sal duma vez
description.brazilian: Tenha mais de 20000 Apelos de Sal de uma vez.

displayName.french: Regardez la peur dans les yeux
displayName.italian: Occhi negli occhi con la paura
displayName.spanish: Mirando al miedo a los ojos

description.english: Face the dangers of the Hidden Realms and earn the Shell Mirror
description.german: Stelle dich den Gefahren der Verborgenen Reiche und erhalte einen Muschelspiegel.
description.french: Affrontez les dangers des Royaumes cachés et obtenez le Miroir-coquillage.
description.italian: Affronta i pericoli dei Reami Nascosti e ottieni lo Specchio della Conchiglia.
description.koreana: 숨겨진 세계의 위험에 맞서고 조개껍데기 거울을 획득하십시오.
description.spanish: Enfréntate a los peligros de los Reinos Ocultos y consigue el Espejo nacarado.
description.schinese: 面对隐藏之域的危险，拿到贝壳明镜。
description.tchinese: 面對隱藏之域的危險並獲得貝殼鏡。
description.russian: Взглянуть в лицо ужасам Тайных земель и получить Зеркало-раковину.
description.japanese: 隠された領域の危険に立ち向かい、貝がらの鏡を手に入れた
description.portuguese: Enfrenta os perigos do Reino Secreto e conquista o Espelho Concha.
description.brazilian: Enfrente os perigos dos Reinos Secretos e obtenha o Espelho de Concha.

displayName.spanish: El nuevo comienzo de la Sal

description.english: Beat Tormenta and prepare the Salt for actual change.
description.german: Besiege Tormenta und bereite das Salz auf echte Veränderungen vor.
description.french: Triomphez de Tormenta et préparez le Sel au véritable changement.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Tormenta e prepara il Salt al vero cambiamento.
description.koreana: 토먼타를 쓰러트리고 솔트의 진정한 변화를 준비하십시오.
description.spanish: Derrota a Tormenta y prepara a la Sal para el cambio real.
description.schinese: 打败痛魔塔，令萨特准备好接受真正的改变。
description.tchinese: 擊敗痛魔塔，讓索爾特做好準備，迎接真正的改變。
description.russian: Победить Торменту и подготовить Соль к истинным переменам.
description.japanese: トルメンタを倒し、ソルトに現実の変化への備えをさせた
description.portuguese: Derrota a Tormenta e prepara o Sal para uma mudança digna desse nome.
description.brazilian: Derrote a Tormenta e prepare o Sal para uma mudança de verdade.

description.english: Finish the game again (any ending) with 2 challenges or more.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel mit mindestens 2 Herausforderungen erneut ab (egal, welches Ende).
description.french: Terminez à nouveau le jeu (n'importe quelle fin) avec au moins 2 défis.
description.italian: Finisci di nuovo il gioco (qualsiasi finale) con 2 sfide o più.
description.koreana: 도전을 2개 이상 완료하고 (아무 엔딩으로나) 게임을 다시 완료하십시오.
description.spanish: Vuelve a terminar el juego (con cualquiera de los finales) con 2 desafíos o más.
description.schinese: 选择至少2项挑战，再次通关游戏（任意结局均可）。
description.tchinese: 以至少 2 項挑戰再度完成遊戲 (結局不限)。
description.russian: Пройти игру еще раз (с любым окончанием) с 2 испытаниями и более.
description.japanese: 2つ以上のチャレンジを選んでゲームを再度クリアした（エンディング問わず）
description.portuguese: Termina novamente o jogo (qualquer final) com 2 ou mais desafi
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo de novo (em qualquer final) com 2 ou mais desafios.
